Episodes.Title: Storm Front
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Following the destruction of the Xindi weapon, the Enterprise crew discovers that they have been sent back in time to 1944. However, history has been altered, leaving Nazi Germany in control of a large portion of the eastern Unite...

Episodes.Title: Storm Front, Part II
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After Silik attacks Trip, Vosk wants to make a deal with Archer: supplies of the ship for the completion of his time machine in return for a trip to the 22nd Century.

Episodes.Title: Home
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: The crew take some time off. Archer meets an old friend, Captain Erika Hernandez. T'Pol takes Trip to Vulcan, with a surprise waiting. Phlox finds out Earth has become xenophobic.

Episodes.Title: Borderland
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After a Klingon ship is attacked, it's discovered the imprisoned Dr. Soong's genetically enhanced humans are responsible. Archer takes him to prevent a war.

Episodes.Title: Cold Station 12
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: The Augments are on their way to Cold Station 12, where Augments embryos are kept.

Episodes.Title: The Augments
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: The Augments have yet again escaped. While Dr. Soong wants to hide the embryos, Malik has an entirely different and way more cruel plan.

Episodes.Title: The Forge
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After a bombing destroyed the Earth embassy on Vulcan, a group known as the Syrrannites are suspected. T'Pol receives a map from her Syrrannite mother, leading into a dangerous desert, the Forge.

Episodes.Title: Awakening
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: T'Pol and Archer confront the Syrrannites and meet T'Pau who denies the embassy bombing. Archer, who has Surak's essence, is asked to help. V'Las threatens Enterprise to make sure an attack on the Syrrannites isn't witnessed.

Episodes.Title: Kir'Shara
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: While Enterprise travels to Andoria to warn them of the attack, Archer tries to bring the Kir'Shara to the High Command.

Episodes.Title: Daedalus
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Dr. Emory Erickson comes aboard to supposedly conduct tests for subquantum transportation. However, he seems to have a different agenda.

Episodes.Title: Observer Effect
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Noncorporeal aliens inhabit the bodies of Enterprise crew members to study how the crew reacts to a lethal virus infection that has afflicted Trip and Hoshi.
Episodes.Language: English, Japanese, German, French, Spanish, Klingon, Russian

Episodes.Title: Babel One
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise escorts Tellarites to peace talks with Andorians. While transporting they rescue Andorians and say the Tellarites attacked them. Enterprise is soon attacked by an Andorian ship, and Archer must prove who is responsible.

Episodes.Title: United
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Captain Archer must convince Vulcans, Tellarites and Andorians to unite to find the Romulan ship.

Episodes.Title: The Aenar
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise finds out the marauder was piloted telepathically by an Aenar, a subspecies from Andoria.

Episodes.Title: Affliction
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: While Enterprise is visiting Earth, Phlox is abducted by the Klingons and forced to research a cure for a virus destined to wipe out the race. Reed is tapped by a secret agency and ordered to betray Archer. Trip transfers to the C...

Episodes.Title: Divergence
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: While Enterprise tries to bring Trip on board to reverse the malicious Klingon modifications, Phlox and Antaak find a cure for the virus that will not please General K'Vagh.

Episodes.Title: Bound
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: The men of Enterprise fall under the seductive control of three Orion women. Trip is the only male member of the crew not to succumb to the women.

Episodes.Title: In a Mirror, Darkly
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Set in the dark and oppressive Mirror Universe, Commander Archer leads a mutiny in a bold attempt to seize control of an advanced starship - a vessel from the future that may be the key to saving the Terran Empire.

Episodes.Title: In a Mirror, Darkly, Part II
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: The Mirror Universe saga concludes as Archer declares himself captain of a formidable starship from the future, while his alien crew launch a rebellion in a desperate bid to keep him from achieving ultimate power.

Episodes.Title: Demons
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: While attending a conference on a proposed interplanetary alliance, Trip and T'Pol find out from a dying woman that they have a baby. Investigation shows the woman was a member of the xenophobic organization Terra Prime.

Episodes.Title: Terra Prime
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Paxton threatens to destroy Starfleet Headquarters if all aliens don't leave Earth. Enterprise must shut down the verteron array on Mars, but it is extremely well defended.

Episodes.Title: These Are the Voyages...
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: In 2370, Commander William T. Riker is trying to clear his mind and relives the last mission of the first Enterprise on the holodeck.
